verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>. Behold, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7392>rideth<s%> upon a <S%H7031>swift<s%> <S%H5645>cloud<s%>, and shall <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: and the <S%H457>idols<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall be <S%H5128>moved<s%> at his <S%H6440>presence<s%>, and the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall <S%H4549>melt<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of it.

And I will <S%H5526>set<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> against the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>: and they shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> against his <S%H251>brother<s%>, and every <S%H376>one<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>; <S%H5892>city<s%> against <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> against <S%H4467>kingdom<s%>. set: Heb. mingle

And the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall <S%H1238>fail<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> thereof; and I will <S%H1104>destroy<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> thereof: and they shall <S%H1875>seek<s%> to the <S%H457>idols<s%>, and to the <S%H328>charmers<s%>, and to them that have familiar <S%H178>spirits<s%>, and to the <S%H3049>wizards<s%>. fail: Heb. be emptied destroy: Heb. swallow up

<S%H853>And<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> will I give <S%H5534>over<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H7186>cruel<s%> <S%H113>lord<s%>; and a <S%H5794>fierce<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H4910>rule<s%> over them, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H113>Lord<s%>, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>. give: or, shut up
And the <S%H4325>waters<s%> shall <S%H5405>fail<s%> from the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and the <S%H5104>river<s%> shall be <S%H2717>wasted<s%> and dried <S%H3001>up<s%>.

And they shall <S%H2186>turn<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> far <S%H2186>away<s%>; and the <S%H2975>brooks<s%> of <S%H4693>defence<s%> shall be <S%H1809>emptied<s%> and dried <S%H2717>up<s%>: the <S%H7070>reeds<s%> and <S%H5488>flags<s%> shall <S%H7060>wither<s%>.

The paper <S%H6169>reeds<s%> by the <S%H2975>brooks<s%>, by the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H2975>brooks<s%>, and every thing <S%H4218>sown<s%> by the <S%H2975>brooks<s%>, shall <S%H3001>wither<s%>, be driven <S%H5086>away<s%>, and be no more. and be: Heb. and shall not be

The <S%H1771>fishers<s%> also shall <S%H578>mourn<s%>, and all they that <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H2443>angle<s%> into the <S%H2975>brooks<s%> shall <S%H56>lament<s%>, and they that <S%H6566>spread<s%> <S%H4365>nets<s%> <S%H6440>upon<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> shall <S%H535>languish<s%>.
Moreover they that <S%H5647>work<s%> in <S%H8305>fine<s%> <S%H6593>flax<s%>, and they that <S%H707>weave<s%> <S%H2355>networks<s%>, shall be <S%H954>confounded<s%>. networks: or, white works

And they shall be <S%H1792>broken<s%> in the <S%H8356>purposes<s%> thereof, all that <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H7938>sluices<s%> and <S%H99>ponds<s%> for <S%H5315>fish<s%>. purposes: Heb. foundations for fish: Heb. of living things

Surely the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H6814>Zoan<s%> are <S%H191>fools<s%>, the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3289>counsellors<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> is become <S%H1197>brutish<s%>: how <S%H559>say<s%> ye unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, I am the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6924>ancient<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%>?

<S%H335>Where<s%> are they? <S%H645>where<s%> are thy <S%H2450>wise<s%> men? and let them <S%H5046>tell<s%> thee now, and let them <S%H3045>know<s%> what the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H3289>purposed<s%> upon <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H6814>Zoan<s%> are become <S%H2973>fools<s%>, the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H5297>Noph<s%> are <S%H5377>deceived<s%>; they have also <S%H8582>seduced<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, even they that are the <S%H6438>stay<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> thereof. they that: or, governors: Heb. corners

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H4537>mingled<s%> a <S%H5773>perverse<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> thereof: and they have caused <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H8582>err<s%> in every <S%H4639>work<s%> thereof, as a <S%H7910>drunken<s%> man <S%H8582>staggereth<s%> in his <S%H6892>vomit<s%>. a perverse: Heb. a spirit of perversities
Neither shall there be any <S%H4639>work<s%> for <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, which the <S%H7218>head<s%> or <S%H2180>tail<s%>, <S%H3712>branch<s%> or <S%H100>rush<s%>, may <S%H6213>do<s%>.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> be like unto <S%H802>women<s%>: and it shall be <S%H2729>afraid<s%> and <S%H6342>fear<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H8573>shaking<s%> of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, which he <S%H5130>shaketh<s%> over it.

And the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall be a <S%H2283>terror<s%> unto <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, every one that maketh <S%H2142>mention<s%> thereof shall be <S%H6342>afraid<s%> in himself, <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, which he hath <S%H3289>determined<s%> against it.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> the <S%H8193>language<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, and <S%H7650>swear<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; <S%H259>one<s%> shall be <S%H559>called<s%>, The <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H2041>destruction<s%>. the language: Heb. the lip of destruction: or, of Heres, or, of the sun

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall there be an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and a <S%H4676>pillar<s%> <S%H681>at<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> thereof to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And it shall be for a <S%H226>sign<s%> and for a <S%H5707>witness<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: for they shall <S%H6817>cry<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H3905>oppressors<s%>, and he shall <S%H7971>send<s%> them a <S%H3467>saviour<s%>, and a great <S%H7227>one<s%>, and he shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be <S%H3045>known<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, and shall <S%H5647>do<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> and <S%H4503>oblation<s%>; yea, they shall <S%H5087>vow<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H7999>perform<s%> it.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5062>smite<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: he shall <S%H5062>smite<s%> and <S%H7495>heal<s%> it: and they shall <S%H7725>return<s%> even to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and he shall be <S%H6279>intreated<s%> of them, and shall <S%H7495>heal<s%> them.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall there be a <S%H4546>highway<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, and the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and the <S%H4714>Egyptian<s%> into <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> with the <S%H804>Assyrians<s%>.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be the <S%H7992>third<s%> with <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and with <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, even a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>:

Whom the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> shall <S%H1288>bless<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H804>Assyria<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> mine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.
